=== Purpose ===
 The aim of this team is to help augment and enhance the archiving of Ubuntu community meetings and events, and provide summaries of meetings in a consistent and concise format.

=== Goals ===

# '''Summarize:''' Work to make easy summaries from available irc logs or monitoring in a consistent manner.
# '''Centralize:''' Work to create a central repository of all logs and summaries. ''see <nowiki>[[ScribesTeam/MeetingCentralSpec|spec]]</nowiki>.''

 ''see also: <nowiki>[[MeetingSummarySpec|Meeting Summary Spec]]</nowiki> submitted by <nowiki>[[Ausimage]]</nowiki>.''

=== Membership ===
 Open to the Ubuntu Community, but must be approved by the team leaders.

=== Projects ===

==== Mootbot ====
ChrisOattes is working on a irc bot called <nowiki>[[ScribesTeam/MootBot|Mootbot]]</nowiki> to record summaries of irc meetings through the use of simple tags included within the traffic. AndrewDavidWilliams is aiding Chris in developing the bot. 
 '' (./) <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/mootbot|Mootbot LP Project Page]]</nowiki>''

 '' {i} <nowiki>[[ScribesTeam/MootBot|Using Mootbot in IRC meetings]]</nowiki>''

==== MeetingLogs ====
JeremyAustinBardo and few other members are  helping to maintain the MeetingLogs on the wiki. New meeting summaries and logs are being posted.  Old meeting logs are being summarized. For meetings not using Mootbot, logs are being recorded or taken from <nowiki>[[http://people.ubuntu.com/~fabbione/irclogs/|fabione's logging bot]]</nowiki> .
 '' (./) <nowiki>[[ScribesTeam/MeetingSummaryTasks|MeetingLogs Tasks Page]]</nowiki>''

 '' {i} <nowiki>[[ScribesTeam/HowToSummarize|Summarizing IRC meetings]]</nowiki>''

==== Meeting Log/Summary Locations ====
Scribes Team is seeking to gather together all existing logs and summaries and needs your help to record where they are at the moment. Please add them to our <nowiki>[[ScribesTeam/MeetingLSLocations| Meeting Log/Summary Locations]]</nowiki> Page.
